summary: A foundational class that aggregates all diffusion pipeline components—models, schedulers, and processors—and provides unified utilities for loading, downloading, saving, device placement, and runtime optimizations such as attention slicing, memory‑efficient attention, and progress‑bar control.
business_intent: Streamline the development and deployment of diffusion‑based generative workflows by offering a single, configurable interface that manages component lifecycles, resource allocation, and performance tuning.
